name: Corlor Ball: Thrill Light Plus
description:
Corlor Ball: Thrill Light Plus is a fun game where you must pay attention to the color of ball since the ball changes the color after every jump. Control is simple, you just have to move to match its color pattern with the color of ball. Hitting a different color Pattern will be game over.
Features:
- Easy but addictive game play
- Cool effects, color and live animations.
- Challenge with world-wide players.
- Lots of levels are waiting for you to challenge
- Kinds of obstacles and combinations.
- Addictive and fast paced.
